title: Loss Of Innocence
description: In a time of stringent moral codes, Lady Lydia Dosett has no choice but to marry Duke Anton Wallace.The Duke, a family friend and childhood crush, is not the man Lydia once knew.In order to avoid losing the luxurious lifestyle that she is accustomed to, Lydia must put aside her naive ideas of love and marriage and step into a world not spoken of in proper social circles.This is a short, steamy erotic romance story of approximately 12,350 words.It is intended for adults only.
author: Bella Carter
